title: ASH: Johnson & Johnson, AbbVie's Imbruvica steals the CLL spotlight with phase 3 study wins
author: Carly Helfand
description: SAN DIEGO—Johnson & Johnson and AbbVie's Imbruvica already competes in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). | Johnson & Johnson and AbbVie's Imbruvica already competes in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). But with some new head-to-head data against a "gold standard" regimen, the partners are looking to own it.
